response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. I understand its significance to you and would like to propose a mutually beneficial deal.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its intrinsic value, providing you with substantial savings while ensuring a profitable transaction for both parties.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
